description:
Izumiya Kazuki is http://anidb.net/ch26379 [Hirosuke]`s buddy at school. During summer he works in a flower shop (and wears a straw hat when delivering flowers to customers).
Kazuki is quite busy dating various girls but with no lasting results so far. Kazuki encourages Hirosuke to confess his feelings to http://anidb.net/ch26380 [Yasuna] but he also talks him into joining him to a four-way date with two "college girls", one of them being http://anidb.net/ch26382 [Suzue].
name: Izumiya Kazuki
